meanings.definition: A type of coral belonging to the order Madreporaria.
meanings.sent1: The madreporians in the ocean provide homes for many sea creatures.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study madreporians to understand their role in the ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The little fish decided to throw a party in the madreporians' neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The madreporians stood tall like ancient castles in the sea.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the madreporians shimmered under the sunlight, creating a mesmerizing sight.

meanings.definition: Members of the class Anthozoa that possess a hard, calcareous skeleton.
meanings.sent1: The madreporians' skeletons provide protection from predators.
meanings.sent2: Divers admire the beauty of madreporians while exploring the reef.
meanings.sent3: The madreporians had a dance-off to see who had the strongest skeleton.
meanings.sent4: The madreporians' skeletons were as tough as a knight's armor.
meanings.sent5: The texture of the madreporians' skeleton felt like rough stone to the touch.
